responsibilities: Engaged with customers to identify their needs and recommend suitable products, consistently meeting weekly sales targets.
Processed transactions accurately using POS systems and managed cash drawers with zero discrepancies.
Maintained store aesthetics by organizing merchandise, updating pricing labels, and executing visual merchandising resets.
Assisted senior sales staff in high-volume environments, providing personalized styling advice to increase customer satisfaction.
Monitored inventory levels and coordinated with the warehouse team to ensure floor availability of popular items.
Resolved customer complaints professionally, ensuring a positive shopping experience and brand loyalty.
